title: Aleksei Gerasimov (footballer, born 1999)
text:
Aleksei Nikolayevich Gerasimov (; born 27 June 1999) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player who plays for <a href="FC%20Znamya%20Truda%20Orekhovo-Zuyevo">FC Znamya Truda Orekhovo-Zuyevo</a>.
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for <a href="FC%20Shinnik%20Yaroslavl">FC Shinnik Yaroslavl</a> on 6 October 2018 in a game against <a href="FC%20Tambov">FC Tambov</a> as an added-time substitute for <a href="Sergey%20Samodin">Sergey Samodin</a>.
